event.title: Talk by Matthias Kirschner "Democracy requires free software" and charity auction at Kernel Recipes in Paris, France

body.p: FSFE's president Matthias Kirschner will give a talk at the Kernel Recipes conference about the importance of Free Software for our society and it's role in protecting democracy. It will also be followed by the Charity Auction in favor of FSFE. This year the conference will takes place on 26-28 September in Mozilla building in Paris with a special focus on FSFE. Entrance of the conference is free of charge but with prior registration required. In the evening social events will be held to have some more discussions with attendees and speakers.
